author: SciShow
description:
Take your personal data back with Incogni! Use code SCISHOW at the link below and get 60% off an annual plan: https://incogni.com/scishow  

In a remote corner of Siberia, a Russian scientist is trying to restore the ecosystem to the way it was during the last Ice Age. And while Pleistocene Park is definitely eccentric, it has implications for the future of the entire planet. 

Hosted by: Madelyn Leembruggen

title: The Russian Scientist Who's Bringing Back the Ice Age
